loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Leah works hard to support her family.

She operates a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from frozen foods.  Leah is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Leah has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is a 52-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are still in school. For the past two years, she has run an internet café in the Philippines. Annabelle is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Annabelle is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy an additional computer unit and provide maintenance for her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional computer unit and provide maintenance for her business

loans.name: Emie

texts.en:
Raymund is 21 years old single son of Emie, who is studying for a Bachelor of Secondary Education, and is currently on his 4th of this 4 year course.

His mother Emie is a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon and supports the family through her buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines.

Emie is borrowing 4,220 PHP to pay for the tuition fees of her son Raymund.

When he graduates, Raymund plans to have a stable job to help his parents.

loans.use: to pay for the tuition fees

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 51 years old and is married with four children. With two of her children in school, Delia works very hard to provide for them.

Delia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items such as canned goods, beverages, and other groceries to sell.

Delia has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Delia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items such as canned goods, beverages, and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 34 years old, and has three children who are in school.

Judith has a jeep transportation business in the Philippines. Judith requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and other materials needed. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Judith has been in this business for 11 years. She would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional spare parts, gasoline and maintenance for her business

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.en:
Bernardita is a 49-year-old married woman with six children. Three of her children are still in school. For the past 15 years, Bernardita has run a food-production business in the Philippines. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Bernardita is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Flor Lissette

texts.es:
Flor, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura y a la crianza de pollos, está acompañada y se levanta junto a su pareja y sus hijos a las 5:30 a.m. para realizar sus actividades diarias.

Flor, trabaja la agricultura en unas parcelas que alquila, este oficio lo realiza durante la mañana junto a su pareja y en el transcurso de la tarde se dedican a cuidar la granja de pollo que poseen y a los oficios domésticos.

Flor, necesita el préstamo para comprar una novilla, porque espera que en el futuro le ayude a iniciar una producción de leche, para vender entre sus vecinos y para generar un ingreso adicional.

Flor, desea que con los ingresos de las actividades que realiza, tener el suficiente dinero para comprar más ganado para poder empezar a producir lácteos.
texts.en:
Flor is 36. She finished 6th grade and she's worked in agriculture and raising chicken for several years. She is in relationship and together with their children, they get up at 5:30 a.m. to complete their daily activities.
Flor farms in parcels she rents. She works the field with her partner in the morning and in the afternoon they take care of their chicken farm and the housework.
Flor needs this loan to buy a heifer, as she hopes to start producing milk in the future, to sell to her neighbors and for additional income.
With the income from these activities, Flor wishes to have enough money to buy more cattle and begin producing dairy products.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Claudia Vanessa

texts.es: Ella es Claudia es una joven de tan solo 21 años de  edad con sueños para ella y su familia, a pesar de no poder estar estudiando debido a la falta de capital para pagar una universidad, esta mujer no renuncia a su sueño y de inmediato busco la forma de generar recursos, vendiendo mercancía por catálogo y ahora está próxima a tener una nueva línea de productos que será la venta de cosméticos, por lo cual pide un apoyo para abastecerse de estos productos que significaran un valioso ingresos que usara no solo para apoyar en los gastos del hogar, sino, que será el principio de sus ahorros para sus estudios.
texts.en: This is Claudia. She is a 21-year-old young woman with dreams for herself and her family. Although she couldn't continue studying due to lack of funds to pay for college, she wouldn't give up her dream and she began right away to find a way to make some money, selling products by catalog. Her next step will be to have a new line of cosmetic products, so she is asking for help to buy them in bulk. These items will be a great source of income to cover her household expenses and also to begin saving for college.

loans.use: to have a new line of cosmetic products

loans.name: Dritan

texts.en:
Dritan is a member of the Egyptian Albanian community of the city of Elbasan. Like so many other members of this community, he’s been doing recycling of plastic and cans with his wife, Bukurie for the past 24 years. They are both photographed with the recycled items in the background. To enhance their earnings, Dritan has also been working in construction or other laboring jobs.  Dritan and Bukurie are in their late 30s and have six children, with the oldest being 16 and the youngest a one-year-old. 

“It’s been tough on us, feeding all these mouths, and we are extremely poor. We try though, yet the majority of our community members are poor despite our great efforts to live a good life. It seems we will never have a good one,” said Bukurie looking away.

They want to add some sheep to secure some food and increase the cash flow for their children, and they desperately seek your help, as per their statement.

loans.use: to buy sheep in order to secure food for their six children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Alver

texts.en:
Alver, 41, is married and has one child. He supports his family as a public employee in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte.

Alver learned about Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC and signed up for a membership where he is involved in its various programs and services. Recently, he applied for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy bags of cement, nails, plywood and lumber for house renovation.

loans.use: to buy bags of cement, nails, plywood and lumber

loans.name: Dayana Paola

texts.es: Dayana en su almacén misceláneo ofrece una gran variedad de artículos para el cuidado personal; colonias, cremas, cosméticos, accesorios y detalles para toda ocasión.  Esta emprendedora de 25 años, inició su negocio por sugerencia de su madre, quien por años se ha dedicado al comercio y le propuso que abriera una miscelánea. Al seguir sus consejos, encontró una forma práctica y agradable de generar ingresos directamente en su residencia, ubicada en el municipio de Barranquilla, ofreciéndole a sus vecinos, amigos y referidos una excelente atención y precios de oportunidad.  En la actualidad cuenta con dos años de funcionamiento y está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en surtido; colonias, cremas, perfumes, cosméticos y accesorios. Con esta inversión obtendrá descuentos por compras al por mayor y así obtendrá una mayor rentabilidad. Su meta a futuro es duplicar las ventas para el próximo año y alcanzar su sueño de comprar su propio apartamento.
texts.en:
Dayana has a general store, where she sells a wide variety of personal care products such as colognes, creams, cosmetics, accessories, and gifts for any occasion. 

This 25-year-old entrepreneur started her business on the advice of her mother, who has been earning a living as a merchant for the past several years and suggested her to open a general store. 

By following her mother's advice, she found a pleasant and practical way of earning an income directly from her home, which is located in the municipality of Barranquilla. She offers excellent customer service and bargain prices to her neighbours, friends, and referrals. She has been running her business for two years now. 

She is requesting her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to purchase an assortment of products such as colognes, creams, perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories. With this purchase, she will get a wholesale discount, and, in this way, she will make a higher profit.  

Her future goals include doubling her sales in the next year and fulfilling her dream of buying her own apartment.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of products such as colognes, creams, perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories.

loans.name: Maria Magnolia De Fatima

texts.es:
Ella es Magnolia es una pujante y trabajadora mujer de 64 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de mercancía, actividad que espera seguir realizando hasta que su salud se lo permita, pues gracias a esta labor sus condiciones de vida, su alimentación, todo en torno a su hogar ha tenido cambios muy positivos.

Junto con su esposo Magnolia ha perseguido un sueño. El cual es tener un hogar propio, siguen con la ilusión viva y esperan lograrlo para poder dejar una herencia a sus dos hijos.

Magnolia necesita un apoyo económico para la compra de mercancía, principalmente ropa y accesorios, dicha préstamo le dará un dinamismo a su negocio, al tener mercancía nueva, y poder buscar atraer otro tipo de público, buscando mejores ingresos para alcanzar su meta.
texts.en:
This is Magnolia. She is a forceful and hardworking, 64 year old woman who works selling merchandise. She hopes to continue doing this work as long as her health allows. Thanks to this job her standard of living, nutrition and everything related to her home has had very positive changes.

Magnolia has pursued a dream, along with her husband, which is to have their own home. They continue with the illusion alive and hope to achieve it in order to leave an inheritance for their two children.

Magnolia needs some financial support to buy the merchandise, mainly clothing and accessories. Said loan will bring dynamism to her business from having new merchandise and being able to attract another type of consumer. She is seeking improved earnings in order to reach her goal.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, mainly clothing and accessories.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.en:
Clemencia is 53 years old and married with four children. For the past three years, she has run a general store in the Philippines and also earns an income from vending food. Clemencia works hard to provide for her family.

Clemencia is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, and other products. She has borrowed and repaid three previous NWTF loans. In the future, Clemencia aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, and other products

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
Valentina es una hermosa joven de 19 años de edad, una mujer luchadora, responsable y comprometida, es madre cabeza de familia, tiene un pequeño de tan solo 3 años de edad, el cual depende 100% de ella.

Valentina para generar los recursos necesarios para su mantenimiento monto con esfuerzo, sudor, ahorros, préstamos una tienda de variedades, como cosméticos, artículos de papelería, chocolates, entre otros.

Para ella lo más importante en su vida es su hijo y quiere dar lo mejor de sí para que ese muchacho que tanto ama tengo lo mejor.

Valentina en el momento se encuentra solicitando un aliento económico para mejorar tanto la mercancía como el aspecto visual de su negocio, es por ello que con el monto que en el momento está solicitando desea comprar mercancía como lo es cosméticos y accesorios para mujer, y desea implementar mejoras locativas, principalmente publicidad visual para el local.
texts.en:
Valentina is a beautiful 19-year-old young woman. She is a fighter, responsible and committed. She is a single mother of a 3-year-old who solely depends on her.
In order to make enough money to support herself and with sweat and hard work, Valentina used savings and loans to open a gift shop, with items like cosmetics, cardstock, chocolates and others.
Her son is the most important thing in her life and she wants to give the best to that little guy she loves so much.
Valentina is asking for financial support to improve her products and the look of her shop. She wants to buy items such as cosmetics, women's accessories as well as make improvements to the shop, especially visual advertising.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as cosmetics, women's accessories and to make improvements to her shop, mainly visual advertising.

loans.name: Zezva

texts.en:
Zezva is 23 years old. He is married and lives in Sagarejo with his wife, an infant child and parents. Zezva works as a shop assistant at a local shop of auto spare parts. He is very experienced in this business and decided to start his own business. 

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan to purchase stock of auto spare parts and open his own shop. He will generate more money and will significantly improve the living conditions for his family. Zezva awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase auto spare parts and open his own shop

loans.name: Sobhana Priyadarshini Shg-A Group

texts.en:
The lady standing on the extreme left is Kasturi, who is the featured borrower of Sobhana Priyadarshini SHG-A. She is a 50-year-old lady from the village of Chuhapali in the Bargarh district. She lives with her old husband, who works as a taxi driver in the nearby town. Her two daughters have already gotten married. Being a dedicated homemaker, Kasturi is engaged with sewing works. Together, the couple work tirelessly to earn their livelihood. 

Kasturi lacks an appropriate toilet in her house. Being an elderly old lady, she is no more able to go a long distance to the field for defecation and urination. That is why Kasturi, along with her other group members, have requested a loan of 36,000 Indian rupees. Kasturi will use her portion of the loan amount to build a new toilet and to purchase all the equipment that will be installed in her toilet.

Kasturi hopes to live healthily for the rest of her life with her husband.

loans.use: to build a new toilet and to purchase all the equipment that will be installed in her toilet

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.pt:
Nasceu em gaza, tem 33 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 1 filho menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que se encontra em gaza.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2011, este é o seu 4º empréstimo com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento e blocos para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra para dar mais conforto a sua família e ser um empresário ao nível do Distrito.
O seu maior desafio é concluir os seus estudos.
texts.en:
Marcelino was born in Gaza. He is 33 and he is married with a small son. He is also responsible for his mother who lives in Gaza.
He began working with Hluvuku in 2011, and this is his 4th loan. He wants to use it to buy construction material such as sand, cement and bricks to continue building his home.
In the future, he would like to finish the works to provide his family with a more comfortable place to live and he will also like to become a businessman at the District level.
His biggest challenge is to finish his education.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and bricks

loans.name: Adoracion

texts.en:
Adoracion is grateful for the two consecutive loans that were granted to her and which she has successfully paid back. They helped her to care for and sustain her pineapple farm business. 

She trusts that she can still avail herself of a PHP 17000 loan which she needs to buy fertilizer and farm inputs to continue to plant, cultivate and reap a productive harvest. Although her farm suffered a bit from the recent storm that hit Philippines, she trusts the Lord that she will get a good harvest in the coming months. She is thanking you in advance for your good heart and support for her business.

Adoracion's simple wish is for God to bless her farm with a continuous harvest. She prays for guidance and a better life for her children. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

 * All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fertilizer and farm inputs.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a sari-sari store owner from Badian, Cebu. She has been in this business for 15 years and earns about PHP6000 per month. Her partner is a farmer and work hard for their three little children. Marilou is 32 years old and dream to be successful in her life. She plans to expand her business in the future for her children’s education. 

Marilou is asking a loan to purchase grocery items such as laundry soap, tooth paste, shampoo, spices, coffee, chips, powdered milk and powdered juice.

loans.use: to purchase laundry soap, tooth paste, shampoo, spices, coffee, chips, powdered milk and powdered juice

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Glen is 19 years old and 1st among the 4 children of the family who is standing in the left side beside him his mother Gina. He is taking up a Bachelor of Science in Management Accounting and he is in the 1st semester of a 3-year course.

His mother Gina has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon for many years and she earns an income from buying and selling rice as well as a general store business.

Gina requested a loan of PHP 3,808 to pay the tuitition fees for her son Glen. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan for the education of her son Glen.

In the future, Glen plans that when he graduates he will look for a stable job so he can help his family.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Jessime

texts.en:
Jessime works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell vegetables business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of vegetables to sell.

Jessime has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Jessime would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Gnoupagagnon Group

texts.fr:
Gaoussou est un éleveur  (bovins, ovins)âgé de 46 ans, marié  père de  10 enfants  âgée de 2 à 22 ans dont  9 sont  scolarisé ,sur la photo  c’est  lui  qui  se tient devant  à côté du bœuf . 
Sa  femme   ménagère  faite  aussi de petit commerce (Arachide, noix du néré etc….) pour gagner sa vie
 Il aime être d’éleveur car il tire beaucoup de profit, son  approvisionnement  se fait  dans  le marché de sa localité. Son bénéfice  mensuel  peut s’élever à 25 000 FCFA.   Il fait  recourt  au R M C R  pour  avoir plus d’argent  afin d’élargir son  d’élevages. Environs 05 ans  Il exerce  ce  travail. Les  revenus  générés  lui  permettent  de couvrir  les  charge  familiales. il vit dans un milieu rural, Son rêve est, dans les jours à venir être un grand commerçant import-export de bétail.
texts.en:
Gaoussou earns a living through raising livestock (cows and sheep). He is a 46-year-old married father to 10 children who are aged between two and 22 years old. Nine of them are currently attending school. He is the man standing directly behind the cow in the photo. His wife is a housewife, but also she earns a living through a small-scale retail venture (selling peanuts and locust bean seeds).

He likes his work as a livestock farmer because it brings in a lot of profit. He gets his livestock from a local market. His monthly profit can reach up to 25,000 FCFA. He has turned to RMCR for more money so he can expand his herd. He has been doing this work for five years. The revenue generated by this activity allows him to meet his family's needs. He lives in a rural area and he hopes to become a successful livestock trader in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to raise and resell

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 31 ans, Ami est mère de quatre enfants. Ami habite à Hédzranawoé pour exercer ses activités. Ami vend des tenues d’ensembles et des slips dans le quartier afin de trouver son bénéfice et satisfaire agréablement ses besoins quotidiens. Ami s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché pour disposer de son stock. Dans le souci de commander des robes et des slips, Ami demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer une marge bénéficiaire pour soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille.
texts.en: Ami is married. She is 31 years old and has four children. Ami lives in Hédzranawoé where she runs her business. Ami sells clothing and underwear locally in order to make a profit and meet her daily needs. Ami stocks up twice a month at the market to have sufficient reserve. To enable her to order some dresses and underwear, Ami requests this loan so that she can make her purchase and make a good profit margin to help her husband with the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 10 units of dresses and 10 dozen pairs of pants.

loans.name: Salomao

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo, tem 52 anos de idade vive maritalmente, pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a escola e responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe e sua tia que vivem na sua casa.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2009. Este é o seu 8º empréstimo com o qual pretende adquirir produtos como ração, pintos e vitaminas, para satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes.
Futuramente pretende ampliar as suas capoeiras e adquirir uma viatura para facilitar o seu negócio.
texts.en:
Salomao was born in Namaacha, province of Maputo. He is 52 and he is married with 3 children who are in school. He is also responsible for his mother and aunt who live with him.
He began working with Hluvuku in 2009. This is his 8th loan and he will like to use it to buy feed, chicks and vitamines to meet his customers's demands.
In the future, he would like to expand his coop and purchase a vehicle to make his business dealings easier.

loans.use: to buy feed, chicks and vitamines

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
Delma is 48 years old and married with five children.

Delma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, shampoo and other personal care products.

Delma has borrowed and repaid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Delma aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Girumugisha Group

texts.fr:
Angelon fait partie   du groupe Girumugisha. Il a 37 ans et est marie à Féronie  une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont  5  enfants  âgés de  2 à 11 ans, dont 2 étudient.

Il  fait le commerce   du riz, de l’huile de palme, de la bière à revendre dans sa boutique  depuis  8 ans. 

Il est à son dix-huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de kilos de riz et de litres d’huile de palme   à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait acheter une parcelle et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Angelon  is a member of the group called Girumugisha. He is 37 and is married to Féronie, a small-scale merchant. Together they have five children aged 2 to 11, of whom 2 attend school.   He has been selling rice, palm oil, and beer in his shop for eight years now.

He is on his 18th loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan that he has requested, he is going to grow his working capital and buy many kilos of rice and palm oil for resale, so he can earn more. In the coming years, he wants to buy a plot of land and see his children attend school.

loans.use: to grow his working capital and buy many kilos of rice and palm oil for resale, so he can earn more

loans.name: Duterimbere 1 Group

texts.fr:
J. Claude fait partie   du groupe Duterimbere 1. Il a 32 ans et est marié à Fidèle  une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont  3  enfants  âgés de  6 à 8 ans, dont 3 étudient.

Il  fait le commerce   de ciment, de fer à béton,…   depuis  12 ans. 

Il  est à son dixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande de ciment   à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait construire une maison  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
J. Claude is a member of the Duterimbere 1 Group. He is 32 years old and married to Fidèle, a farmer. Together, they have three children, aged between six and eight years old. All three of their children are currently receiving an education.

J. Claude earns a living through selling cement and iron rebars, which he has been doing for 12 years. This will be his second loan with Turame. With this Kiva loan, he will be able to increase his capital and purchase a large quantity of cement, which will be resold at a profit.

In the coming years, J. Claude would like to be able to build his own home and see that his children continue to receive an education.

loans.use: to increase their capital and purchase a large quantity of cement, which will be resold at a profit

loans.name: Giraneza Group

texts.fr:
Apollinaire   fait partie du groupe  Giraneza  et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 35 ans et est marié à Sylvie, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 2 à 8 ans dont  3 étudient.

Il fait le commerce des habits depuis 8 ans. 

Il  est à son vingtième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait acheter une voiture et voir ses enfants étudier.


.
texts.en:
Apollinaire is part of the Giraneza group and lives in Gitega. She is 35 years old and married to Sylvie, a farmer. Together, they have four children, ages 2 to 8, three of whom attend school.

He has been selling clothes for 8 years. 

He is on his twentieth loan at Turame. With the KIVA loan that he gets, he is going to augment his capital and buy a lot of clothes to resell in order to earn more money.

In the coming years, he would like to buy a car and send his children to school. 


.

loans.use: to augment his capital and buy a lot of clothing to resell in order to earn more money

loans.name: Gracieta

texts.pt:
A senhora Gracieta de 43 anos de idade é comerciante casada, mãe de 5 filhos todos a estudar vive na casa própria onde tem uma mini mercearia.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, pedra, areia, varões para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, fazer um salão de cabeleireiro na sua casa como forma de reforçar a  renda familiar.
Diz que a insuficiência de fundos é seu maior desafio e para superá-lo conta com ajuda de seu esposo que é segurança e que irá solictar mais empréstimos.
texts.en:
Gracieta is 43 years old. She is married with 5 children who are in school and they live in the house that they own where they run a grocery store.
She will use this loan to buy cement, stone, sand, beams to continue building her house.
Her dream is to finish the works and build a hair salon out of her home to compliment her household income.
Her biggest challenge is her lack of funds, but she tries to overcome his obstable with the help of her husband and asking for more loans.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand and beams

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 52-year-old married mother of six children who has been working as a tailor for 20 years. She runs her business from her house and works hard to develop it in a well-managed way, all while taking good care of her beloved family at the same time.

Fatima is the primary financial supporter of her family. Her husband is a taxi driver with a very low income. Fatima is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua in order to pay her children's higher education expenses.

Her dream for the future is to open her own separate tailoring shop.

loans.use: to pay for her children's higher education expenses

loans.name: Sodikjon

texts.en:
Sodikjon is an active young man was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1992. He is living in big town with his parents, who are teachers, where he is a third year student at university.  He tried and entered the university, but university is commercial and they need to pay the tuition fee on time. 

They have not enough money to pay the full sum immediately. Sodikjon is requesting a loan from IMON and KIVA to pay his higher education costs. He hopes to be supported and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay his higher education costs

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lydia is 60 years old and has one child in school.

Lydia has a buy-and-sell firewood business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more bundles of firewood to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Lydia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more bundles of firewood to sell

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Emeliza is 3rd of three children in the family. Her mother Remedios as a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon supports the family through her general store business in the Philippines.

Emeliza is studying Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education and is currently of her 1st of this 4 years-course.

Emeliza is borrowing Php 2370 to pay for tuition fee of her daughter Emeliza for the 1st semester.

When she graduates, Emeliza plans to have a permanent job to help her parents.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees in Secondary Education for her daughter

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elsa is 44 years old and has three children who are in school.

Elsa has a bakeshop business in the Philippines. Elsa requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients, and other supplies for her business.

Elsa has been in this business for 10 years.  In the future, Elsa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, and other supplies for her bakery business

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is 39 years old and married with seven children, five of whom are in school.

She earns a living by buy and sell fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. Erma is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Erma has been in buy and sell fruits and vegetables and earns additional income from her general store and raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Prescila

texts.en:
Prescila is 55 years old and married with four children. For the past eleven years she has earned an income raising chickens and operating a sari-sari, or small general store, in the Philippines.

Prescila took out and successfully repaid a previous loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF. She is now applying for an additional loan of 29,500 PHP to buy feed and other supplies for her chickens. She is working tirelessly to secure her family’s future.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies for her chickens

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Leonora works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Leonora is borrowing PHP 17000 through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance for her motorcycle transport business.

Leonora has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years and earns more income from a general store.

Cresencia is borrowing 16000 PHP through NWTF to purchase ingredients such as sugar, flour and sticky rice for her food vending business.

Cresencia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as sugar, flour, and sticky rice for her food production business.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is a 39-year-old married woman with five children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Elsa has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients such as sugar, sticky rice and coconut for her food production business.

Elsa has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Elsa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar, sticky rice and coconut for her food production business.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. Leonida has been in this business for 4 years now.

Leonida requested a 19500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks like canned goods, snack foods, cooking oil, cereals, coffee, detergent soap, etc. to sell in her general store.

In the future, Leonida would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks like canned goods, snack foods, cooking oil, cereals, coffee, detergent soap, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Shnaz

texts.en:
Shnaz is a 29-years old married woman, who lives with her husband and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a scrap shop and deals with the scrap iron, aluminum, plastic bottles etc. He has been purchasing scrap goods from the common people and sell it to the recycling factories. Nowadays due to household expenses he does not have amount to buy scrap goods and does not have scrap to sell for getting money. 

Therefore, Shnaz had requested a loan for her husband, so that he could buy scrap goods, establish his enterprise, and make some savings to meet sudden needs or incidents. She is very impressed with this support and shows her wish to take more loans after the payment of this loan. She thanks  Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to used this loan for her husband's scrap shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for her husband's blacksmith shop.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is a woman of 31 years old with 4 children. She owns and operates a small business of selling cabbage, cucumber, eggplant, in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Daisy requested for a loan to buy vegetable seeds (cabbage,cucumber, eggplant), wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, chemicals, hand gloves, to help her with the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds(cabbage,cucumber, eggplant), wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, chemicals, hand gloves,

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a 34 year old mother with 3 children. She runs a small business of cooking rice and curry and sell them in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Joy requested for a loan to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, gas stove,onions, plastics bags, container, to help her run the business. She will use her profit to expand her business and provide for family needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, gas stove,onions, plastics bags, container,

loans.name: Luafulu

texts.en: Luafulu is a 63 year old mother with 5 children. She owns and operates a small business of selling pancake, pork cake, buns in her village to earn a living. Luafulu requested for a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, bottle of vegetable oil, fry pan, wooden spoon, plastic bags, yeast, to help her run the business. She will use her profit to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2006.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, bottle of vegetable oil, fry pan, wooden spoon, plastic bags, yeast,

loans.name: Ane

texts.en:
Ane is 18 years old and single. She runs a small business selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living. 

Ane requested a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei designs and containers to assist her in running the business. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

She hopes to expand her business using her profit.   She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, elei designs and containers.

loans.name: Rona

texts.en:
Rona is 29 years old and single. She runs a small business of selling pancake in her community to earn a living. Rona requested for a loan to buy a box of chicken, yeast, sack of sugar, plastic bags, fry pan, wooden spoon, flour, to run the business. 

She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, yeast, sack of sugar, plastic bags, fry pan, wooden spoon, flour,

loans.name: Abudo

texts.pt:
Senhor Abudo tem 41 anos de idade, casado e pai de 3 filhos frequentando o ensino primário e técnico médio respectivamente, é docente, vive em casa própria com a sua família, sustenta sua irmã mais nova.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, areia, pedras para dar continuidade a construção da sua da sua casa 
No futuro pretende concluir a construção da sua casa e fazer mestrado e também pretende reabrir a sua mercearia como forma de aumentar a renda familiar.
A exiguidade de fundos atrasa os seus projectos, assim sendo vai continuar a apostar nos empréstimos de modo a lograr o desejado.
texts.en:
Abudo is 41 years old. He his married with 3 children who are in grade school and high school. He is a teacher and he lives in a house he owns with his family. He also supports his youngest sister.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sand and stone to continue building his home.
In the future, he hopes to finish building his home and get his master's degree and he also wants to reopen his grocery store to increase his family income.
The lack of funds delays his proyects, so he believes these loans will help him achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stone to continue building his home

loans.name: Solialofi

texts.en:
Solialofi is 44 years old with 5 children. She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 2 years. 

Solialofi requested for a loan to buy banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals, to assist her run the business. She joined SPBD in 2005, and she will expand her business using her profit.

loans.use: to buy banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals,

loans.name: Tony

texts.en:
Tony is 28 years old. He runs a business of selling ice cream in his village to earn a living. He has been doing this for more than a year. Tony requested for a loan to buy  box of ice cream, cones, ice bag, container, to help him run the business. 

He joined SPBD in 2015, and he will use his profit to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy a box of ice cream, cones, ice bag, container,

loans.name: Falefou

texts.en:
Falefou is 28 years old and single. She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Falefou requested for a loan to buy banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals, to assist her run the business. She joined SPBD in 2015, and hopes to use her profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals,

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 39-year-old married man from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living.So Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN, which will enable him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Ahmad’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking and also washing clothes and dishes.Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house

loans.name: Blanca Yanira

texts.es: Blanca de 43 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica desde hace 18 años a la venta de jugos y sodas en su casa de habitación, por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con este negocio. Ella logro construir su vivienda con mucho esfuerzo y en ella habita junto a sus dos hijos de 20 y 11 años de edad, de los cuales el menor estudia y el mayor le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ella se siente muy orgullosa de sus hijos, ya que ha logrado sacarlos adelante como madre soltera. Blanca desea mejorar su negocio, ya que actualmente solo tiene una hielera en la que guarda las bebidas, pero ella desea comprar una refrigeradora y más producto y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: sodas, jugos y una refrigeradora y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos económicos y la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca, who is 43 years old, is a hard-working woman who has sold juices and sodas in her home for 18 years, and she feels happy to be able to have this business. She managed to construct her home with great effort, and she lives in it together with her two children, ages 20 and 11, of whom the younger one is in school and the older one helps her with the household expenses. She feels very proud of her children, since she has managed to raise them as a single mother.

Blanca wants to improve her business, since now she has only a cooler in which she keeps the beverages. But she wants to buy a refrigerator and more products, and for this she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in sodas, juices, and a refrigerator and in this way improve her economic income and the quality of life of her children.

loans.use: to invest in sodas, juices, and a refrigerator and in this way improve her economic income and the quality of life of her children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married and she works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Elizabeth is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Elizabeth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Rovelie

texts.en:
Rovelie is 41 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. Rovelie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell dried coconut meat business in the Philippines, and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks to sell.

At the picture this is the stock room as will as a dryer of the dried coconut meat, this product will be sell every twice a week.

Rovelie has been in this business for 16 years. In the future Rovelie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es: Hace 22 años que Hipólito se dedica a cultivar la tierra produciendo Frijoles, Maíz y Café, en una comunidad de Olanchito Honduras, es un hombre muy trabajador y junto con su esposa Isidra anhelan llegar a   tener un pequeño negocio donde vender productos de limpieza corporal y comestibles, ya que donde viven tiene muy poco acceso a este tipo de  negocio y deben recorrer largas distancias para obtener estos productos , pero para ello el primer paso es adquirir un sistema solar, ya que en la comunidad no hay acceso al servicio  de  energía eléctrica, es por esto que Hipólito decidió solicitar financiamiento a Soluz Honduras para cumplir con este deseo y también para mejorar su calidad de vida, ya que el sistema solar les beneficiara en  tener mejor iluminación y ahorrar en cargar sus teléfonos celulares.
texts.en:
For twenty-two years, Hipolito has been making a living growing beans, corn and coffee in the community of Olanchito, Honduras.  He is a hard-working man and together with his wife Isidra they hope to be able to have a small business in which to sell personal hygiene products and groceries since where they live there is little access to this type of business and they have to go great distances to get these products.
But for him the first step is to acquire a solar system since in the community there is no electric service. For this reason, Hipolito decided to request financing from Soluz Honduras in order to fulfill this wish and also to improve their quality of life since the solar system will benefit them to have better illumination and save on charging their cell phones.

loans.use: to buy a solar system which will improve the conditions of life of his home.

loans.name: Gilma

texts.en:
Grayzciel Joy is 17 years old, single and 6th among the 8 children of the family who is standing in the left side of the photo. Her mother Gilma is standing in the right side, she has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon for many years. She earns a living by investing in boarding house renting.

Gilma is taking a loan of PHP 16,271 to pay the tuition fees of her daughter who is currently taking up Midwifery for the 1st semester of her 2 year-course.

In the future, Grayzciel Joy plans to look for a job to help her parents financially and so she will be able to send her brother and sister to college.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Yudys

texts.es:
Yudys es una mujer de 44 años de edad, es toda una guerrera, cabeza de familia, madre de un muchacho de 16 años de edad al cual le ha dado todo, no le quedo grande el papel de padre y madre, pues tiene todas las capacidades y espíritu para hacerlo. 

Yudys se dedica a la preparación de alimentos, vende principalmente fritos, como lo son; pasteles, empanadas, panzerotis, papas (vegetal) rellenas, la cual realiza afuera de su casa.

Los tiempos cambian, la fuerte competencia que se presentan en el sector hacen a Yudys reevaluar su negocio y ha llegado a la conclusión de que necesita elementos e insumos para dinamizar su actividad, es por ello que desea solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de una freidora nueva con la que aumentara su producción, comprar insumos y parte del capital será destinado a una nueva línea de venta que será surtido de sandalias.
texts.en:
Yudys, 44, is a real fighter, head of household, and mother of a 16-year-old lad to whom she has given everything.  It was not too much for her to play the role of father and mother since she possesses all the capacity and spirit to do so.
Yudys makes a living preparing food.  She principally sells fried foods such as pastries, turnovers, small calzones, and stuffed potatoes, which she makes outside of her house.
Times change.  The strong competition present in the area has caused Yudys to reevaluate her business and she has arrived at the conclusion that she needs things and supplies in order to recharge her work.  For this reason, she wants to request economic support in order to buy a new fryer with which to increase her production, to buy supplies and a part of the capital will be used on a new sales line which will be an assortment of sandals.

loans.use: to buy a new fryer with which to increase her production, to buy supplies, and part of the capital will be used for a new sales line which will be an assortment of sandals.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael tiene 44 años de edad, vive con su conyuge y sus menores hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ismael se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Ismael espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ismael is 44 years old. He lives with his spouse and children in a rural part of the district of Santo Tomás which is located in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. The inhabitants of this district work mainly in agriculture, raising livestock and commerce.

Ismael works raising and selling small animals like chicks, chickens, ducks and turkeys amongst others. His business is located at his house. He has ten years of experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy a greater quantity of animals like chickens, ducks, turkeys and chicks amongst others as well as buying balanced feed for them. Doing this Ismael hopes to offer a better product to his clients which will permit him to generate greater income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals like chickens, ducks, turkeys and chicks amongst others as well as buying balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Sirley Lorena

texts.es:
Sirley es un joven de 23 años de edad, una empresaria firme, comprometida y responsable, que, con su actividad de fabricación de bolsas plásticas con cierre, ha sacado su familia conformada por dos hijos adelante.
 
Su mayor tesoro son sus dos muchachos de 3 y 4 años de edad, esas personitas que la inspira hacer  una mejor empresaria diariamente y hacen que de lo mejor de sí en cada día de trabajo.

Sirley es una trabajadora independiente pero no se encentra trabajando sola, esta sorprendente mujer genera 2 empleos y con un préstamo que en el momento se encuentra diligenciando aspira a generar una vacante más.

Sirley quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de codo, que son las ideales para coser el cierre de las bolsas plásticas.
texts.en:
Sirley is a young woman of 23. She is a determined, committed, and responsible entrepreneur who, with her business of making plastic purses with closures, is raising her family, which is formed by her two children. Her great treasure is her two children, ages 3 and 4, these little people who inspire her every day to be a better businesswoman and make her give the best of herself to her work each day.

Sirley is an independent worker, but she does not work alone. This amazing woman generates two jobs, and with the loan that she is now taking steps to obtain, she aspires to generate another position.

Shirley wants to apply for a loan for the purchase of a jeans double-stitch sewing machine, which is the ideal [machine] for sewing the closure of the plastic purses.

loans.use: to buy a jeans double-stitch sewing machine to generate a job

loans.name: Yuris Yohana

texts.es:
Ella es Yuris es una mujer de 27 años de edad que trata día a día de llevar el alimento a su hogar.
Por falta de oportunidades de trabajo y ante la necesidad latente de generar recursos Yuris inicio con la venta de mercancía, informalmente en su hogar y ha sido este negocio el que le ha permitido salir adelante junto con sus dos hijos de 4 y 7 años de edad.

Dado los buenos resultados que generado su negocio Yuris quiere invertir en este para mejorar sus ingresos, es por ello que desea solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una vitrina, prodcutos de uso personal y surtido.
Este dinero será de gran ayuda ya que tendrá un activo que le permita exhibir toda su mercancía y dispondrá de capital para tener mercancía como ropa y accesorios.
texts.en:
This is Yuris, a 27 year old woman who tries day by day to provide food for her home.

Out of a lack of employment opportunities and an intense need to generate resources Yuris started selling merchandise informally from her house. It has been this business that has allowed her to get ahead together with her two children aged 4 and 7 years old.

Given the good results that her business has generated Yuris wants to invest in it to improve her income. So she wants to request a loan to buy a display case personal use products and other stock.

This money will be of great use as she will have a fixed asset that will allow her to display all her merchandise and have capital for merchandise like clothing and accessories.

loans.use: to buy a display case, an assortment of accessories for women and personal use products.

loans.name: Guljamol

texts.en: Guljamol is a bright woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1978. She is living in a village with her family. She is married and has one child three years old. Her husband is an agrarian. Since 2011 she has done business in agriculture. She is a farmer and she keeps livestock at home and after feeding them, sells them at a higher price. She gets milk from cows and makes national thick yogurt, oil, etc. for using and selling to neighbors. She likes her activity and wants to buy more livestock. She is asking for financial support from Kiva to buy livestock. She awaits your compassion and support.

loans.use: to buy more livestock

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 51 years old, married, and has three children. Her husband is a carpenter; he is the one who helps her in providing for the needs of their family. She aims to have a greater income, so she plants bananas and sells them to the market.

Because of the increasing price of commodities nowadays, she decided to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for the bananas to produce a good quality of bananas. She can deliver them to the market, and that will generate more income.

Erlinda’s plan for the future is to earn more profit and expand her business to support her children for their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her banana farm.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Jennifer works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell frozen foods business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Jennifer is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase sausage, hot dogs, and other frozen foods to sell.

Jennifer has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sausage, hot dogs, and other frozen foods to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Ofir

texts.es:
Ella es Gloria, es una mujer de 49 años de edad, madre cabeza de familia, tiene dos muchachos adolescentes.
Ella se separó de su esposo, anteriormente era ama de casa, se preocupaba por todo lo relacionado con el hogar, pero ahora ante la ausencia de su pareja, le tocó salir a las calles a rebuscar su sustento diario y el de sus hijos.
Gloria encontró en la venta de mercancía un medio rápido para generar ingresos, permitiéndole no solo ganar dinero sino, disponer de tiempo para atender su hogar.
Su deseo es generar los ingresos suficientes para pagar la educación de sus muchachos, es por ello que acude ante una entidad financiera a solicitar un préstamo para aumentar su inventario y vender mayor cantidad de mercancía.
Formalmente, Gloria quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido en calzado y ropa.
texts.en:
She is Gloria, 49, mother and head of household.  She has two adolescent sons.
She separated from her husband.  Formerly, she was the housewife and concerned herself with all matters in the home, but in light of the absence of her husband, she has been forced to go out in the streets to seek her daily sustenance and that of her sons.
Gloria discovered a rapid means to generate income in the sales of merchandise, permitting her not only to earn money but also to have time to attend to her home.
Her wish is to generate sufficient income to pay for the education of her sons.  For this reason, she approached a financial entity to request a loan to increase her inventory and sell a greater quantity of merchandise.
Formally, Gloria wants to request a loan to buy an assortment of footwear and clothing.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Gregory

texts.en:
Gregory is 42 years old. He is married and they have four children. He farms maize and beans and also does masonry work. He has been in the business for seven years.

This is his fourth loan with VisionFund Kenya. He will use the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds. He will use the anticipated profits from his expanded business to educate his children and expand his business further.

His hope and dream is to be a successful businessman.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Genevilla

texts.en:
Genevilla is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business farming vegetables in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional seedlings and other farm supplies for her business farming vegetables.

Genevilla has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from fishing.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Genevilla has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional seedlings and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 32 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, noodles, personal care products, etc.

Mary Ann has borrowed and paid back two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from fishing.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, noodles, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Recheal is 54 years old. She is married with six children. She has had a hotel business for 10 years.

She will be using the loan to purchase hotel furniture and hopes this will help her to grow the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to boost the business and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase hotel furniture to help her to grow the business.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo, de 54 años de edad, está casado, vive con su esposa, estudio hasta sexto grado, se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. junto a su esposa para iniciar las labores agrícolas y para ordeñar las vacas, todos sus hijos ya están casados.

Eduardo, se dedica  a la agricultura en donde trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado de los animales; mientras que en la tarde Eduardo dedica a hacer viajes en un carro que posee, para las personas que lo solicitan.

Eduardo, necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca, porque necesita incrementar la producción de leche y empezar a producir queso, crema y cuajada, junto a su esposa  para obtener ingresos.

Eduardo, sueña con comprar un terreno para sembrar y donde pueda tener sus animales, ya que actualmente alquila un terreno para tenerlos.
texts.en:
Eduardo, aged 54, is married and lives with his wife. He studied up to sixth grade. He and his wife get up at 5:00 a.m. to start their farming activities and milk the cows. All of their children are already married.

In the mornings, Eduardo works in agriculture, and his wife does the household chores and cares for the animals. In the evenings, he uses his own car to drive people who request this service. 

Eduardo needs a loan to buy a cow because he and his wife need to increase the milk production to start producing cheese, cream, and curd in order to earn more income.

Eduardo dreams of buying a plot of land where he can grow crops and keep his animals because he is currently renting the plot of land he has.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Peris

texts.en:
Peris is aged 65 years and she supports five children.

She has been a farmer for the last 17 years and the business earns her KES 8,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market.

She plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and pay school fees for her children.

Her hope is to educate her children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Azaria

texts.en:
Azaria is a young man, a resident of Kijungu Mbarara. He grew up in a humble family in Bushenyi but went to Kampala for his private business. Later on he had a misunderstanding with his wife who ran away with his working capital and she got married to another man. Since then Azaria started a new life with the children and relocated to Mbarara where he started small but now has a shop in town which is feeding his children.

He wants a loan of UGX 5,000,000 to boost his clothes sales business by buying more stock of the clothes to attract more customers and increase his sales. He wants to be able to accumulate money to buy a plot in Mbarara town where he wants to put his residential home. He has a dream to look for a companion who can look after his children and they can work together for the betterment of his family. He so much appreciates the support.

loans.use: to boost his sales by stocking more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 39 years old, married and has three children to support. To earn a living and to help her husband in providing for their family, Daisy is engaged in crops production. She plants many kinds of vegetables and sells them to the market. 

Due to the increasing price of commodities nowadays, Daisy aims to increase her income. Therefore, she decided to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for her vegetables. This will help her to produce good quality products for delivery to the market which will generate more income. 

Daisy’s plan for the future is to save money from her business income to sustain her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her vegetable production

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 55 years old, married and lives in Mantic, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a rice field that primarily support the needs of her family. She sign up for membership with Paglaum MPC to avail financial assistance for her rice production business. 

Recently, she avails a loan of PHP 7,000.00 to purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines

location.town: Tangub-Mantic, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Mi

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is aged 59 years and she supports 4 children. 

She has been a farmer for the last 10 years and the business earns her KES 6,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest.

She plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and pay school fees for her children. 

Her hope is to educate her children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is aged 39 years and she supports 6 children. 

Sher has been a farmer for the last 8 years and the business earns her KES 5,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and the surplus for sale in the market. 

She plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and pay school fees for her children. 

Her hope is to educate her children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and the surplus for sale in the market.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is aged 57 years and he supports 5 children. 

He has been a farmer for the last 10 years and the business earns him KES 6,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and the surplus for sale in the market. 

He plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and pay school fees for his children. 

His hope is to educate his children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and the surplus for sale in the market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and the surplus for sale in the market.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta is 43 years old and has two children. Marieta is married and has one child still in school.

Marieta is in the agricultural business, farming fruit in the Philippines. Marieta requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Marieta has been in this business for 3 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Joenaline

texts.en:
Joenaline, aged 25, is a married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Joenaline has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years

Joenaline has requested a PHP 12,000 loan  through NWTF to buy more clothes such as pants, dresses, t-shirts. etc. to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more clothes such as pants, dresses, t-shirts, etc. to sell

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Tessie works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Tessie is borrowing PHP 13000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her bakery business.

Tessie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 39 years old and single. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur who has had a fish vending business in the Philippines for the past two years. 

Leonila successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She has requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

In the future, Leonila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Flaviana

texts.en:
Flaviana, aged 63, is a married woman with four children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Flaviana has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She  has been in this business for 10 years. 

Flaviana has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her fishing business. She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia works hard to support six children. She is a widow and has an agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines.

Cecilia requested a 6,750 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency.

Cecilia is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money; she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Cecil

texts.en:
Cecil, aged 29, is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for four years.

Cecil has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of ready-to-wear clothing to sell to her customers. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of ready-to-wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Genie

texts.en:
Genie is single and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Genie has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Genie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jocelyn is 41 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a 29,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional variety of fish to sell to her customers.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional variety of fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Sayvali

texts.ru: Сайвали добрый человек из района Бохтар.  Ему 29 лет, он женат и отец двоих детей. Сайвали очень любит, и заботиться о своей семье. Так как их дети ещё несовершеннолетние Сайвали помогает своей жене в работе по дому, а она ему. Сайвали с детства занимается растениеводством.  Эта работа приносить ему массу удовольствия. Он очень любит ухаживать за растениями и овощами, холить и лелеять их. Сайвали замечательный мастер своего дела. Сейчас ему необходимо приобрести минеральные удобрения для обработки земли, где он посадил осенний урожай. Без минеральных удобрений он боится не получит хороший урожай. Сайвали очень верит в вашу помощь и надеется, что его усилия не уйдут напрасно.
texts.en: Sayvali is a good man from the Bohtar district. His is 29 years old, married, and has two children. Sayvali loves and cares for his family. Since his children are still young Sayvali helps his wife with work around the house, and she helps him. Sayvali has farmed since childhood and become a true expert in his field. He loves to tend and pamper the plants, and receives great satisfaction from the work. Right now he needs to buy fertilizer in order to prepare the ground where he will plant for fall harvest. He is worried that without fertilizer he will receive a poor harvest. Sayvali trusts in your help and hopes that his efforts will not be in vain.

loans.use: To purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Benkan Group

texts.fr: Brehima est un agriculteur de 45 ans marié, père de 8 enfants âgés, de 17 à 3 ans. 2 de ses enfants vont à l’école. En plus de l’agriculture Brehima fait l’élevage de mouton. Son ambition est de pouvoir  par l’élevage subvenir à la charge familiale. Brehima fait recourt au RMCR pour pouvoir acheter plus de moutons pour l’élevage. L’achat et la vente des moutons sont effectués sur les marchés locaux. Le profit tiré de la vente des animaux lui permettra de prendre en charge les frais de condiment de la famille et les frais scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
Brehima is a 45-year-old farmer and the married father of eight children, aged 3 to 17. Two of his children go to school. In addition to agriculture, he raises sheep. His ambition is to cover family expenses through his livestock farming.

Brehima has turned to RMCR to purchase more sheep to raise. The buying and selling of sheep is carried out at the local markets. The profit made from the sale of the animals will enable him to cover the cost of food for the family and schooling for the children.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to raise and then sell later

loans.name: Alaysa

texts.en:
Alaysa is happy and thankful for the continuous support she receives for her tricycle business. It helped her render safe and consistent service to her passengers. She continues to persevere and takes care of her tricycle for it is a good source of income for her to save for her future plan to study.
 
Alaysa trusts that she can avail a Php 25000 loan to pay for the regular tricycle maintenance. It is important that her tricycle is properly maintained to assure her of an efficient service and stable income. She is thanking God and you for your good heart for supporting her in her livelihood. 

Alaysa aims to grow her transportation business so she could pursue her dream to go back to school and pursue a college education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and maintain her tricycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets, feed and for school fees.

loans.name: Benkadi N°1 Group

texts.fr: Dans la photo du groupe Aly est celui tient la tête du bœuf en mains à cote. Aly est un client qui fait l’embouche, marié, âgé de 48 ans et père de huit (8) enfants dont quatre écoliers. Il exerce l’activité d’emboucher depuis 10 ans. Il élève les bovins (bœufs, vaches). Il vend dans les marches environnant. En plus Aly aime son activité. Sa femme est une ménagère et une commerçante détaillante d’arachide. Il a emprunté pour investir dans l’achat d’un bœuf, la nourriture et soin de ce bœuf. Il aimerait dans l’avenir construit une maison en dure  pour ces enfants. Les obstacles auxquels se heurte l’activité sont nourriture insuffisante pour  nos bœufs, manque de vétérinaire. Son bénéfice prévisionnel mensuel varie  de  25 000 à 50 000f.
texts.en:
In the group photo, Aly is the one holding the cattle’s head aside. A client who raises livestock, he is married, 48 years old, and the father of eight children, of whom four are in elementary school. Aly has been a livestock farmer for ten years raising cattle (steers, cows). He sells at nearby markets. And he likes his work. His wife is a homemaker and a retail merchant of peanuts.
