Aly borrowed to invest in buying a steer and food and healthcare for it. For the future, he would like to build a solid house for his children. The obstacles which his business runs up against are insufficient food for the cattle and a lack of veterinary care. His projected monthly profit varies from 25,000 to 50,000 francs.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and then sell later

loans.name: Manilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Manilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fruit vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. Manilyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell to her customers for her fruit vending business.

Manilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy eggs, butter, sugar, wheat, etc and fodder for the pig.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is 35 years old. She is a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Jonathan, an OFW, and blessed with six children of which two are in high school, and four are in the elementary level. Raising six children in a developing country is a big challenge for most Filipinos. Couples like Cristina's find ways and means to provide for their daily needs.

Cristina has had a fruit shake business for seven years. She buys several flavors of powdered fruit to make fruit shakes such as bananas, mango, buco pandan, strawberry and melon shakes. Being a tropical country with humid weather, a fruit shake business is a surefire income generator. It is a big help to send her six children to school.

To help her continue operations of her business, Cristina is requesting for an PHP 10000 loan to buy several powdered fruit flavor juice to make her fruit shakes at her fruit stand. She will is thanking God for the financial help that will be given her and a good return on her investment since it will surely cover their daily sustenance and fund her children's schooling.

Cristina hopes that her business will continue to be successful so she could save money to buy a lot for her future house. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week where she finds strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

 * All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy powdered juice to make fruit shakes and buy some school supplies.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 44 years old, resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Alex, an electrician and has three children in college, high school and elementary, respectively. 

They may not have the luxuries enjoyed by families living in first world countries but as with most Filipinos, Imelda's family is happy and content living a simple life having three meals a day and sending their children to school. 

Imelda has run a small general store for eight years. She values her store as it provides her additional income to help meet her family's needs and the school needs of her  children. Although at times she encounters difficulty collecting receivables from some of her customers she maintains her positive outlook and joyful spirit that they can get through with their lives. 

To help sustain and expand her store operations Imelda is humbly asking your help for a Php 10000 loan to buy more grocery items like canned goods, coffee, eggs, instant noodles, beverages etc. She wants to fill her store with food and household items such as instant noodles, canned goods, eggs, oil, beverages and toiletries to attract more customers.  

Imelda dreams to have a big grocery store someday and become more financially stable. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

 * All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Rolibeth

texts.en:
Rolibeth works hard to support one children. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Rolibeth requested a PHP 6,750 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp to have a backup light in case of an emergency.

Rolibeth is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Eridora

texts.en:
Eridora is a widowed woman, 54 years old with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Eridora has a buy and sell of personal collection products business in the Philippines. Eridora requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as beauty products, body lotion, perfume, powder and other personal care products.

Eridora has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as beauty products, body lotion, perfume, powder and other personal care products

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Maricar works hard to support her family.

She has a fruit vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Maricar is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell for her fruit vending business.

Maricar has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell

loans.name: Omaira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Omaria es una señora de 54 años de edad, dedicada a la preparación y posteriormente venta de comida, un pequeño negocio que logro montar desde hace poco y del cual se generan los ingresos mínimos para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su casa.

Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de un nuevo carro para comidas, sillas, utensilios desechables e insumos como maíz, harina y aceite en gran cantidad.

Para esta mujer no hay nada imposible, quiere seguir trabajando y cumplir el sueño de formalizar su negocio para en un futuro dejárselo a sus hijos.

Con su aporte Omaira podrá seguir sus sueños, anímate, haz un préstamo.
texts.en:
Omaira is a 54-year-old woman. She makes and sells food, a small business that she was able to establish recently and from which she generates the minimum income to meet the basic necessities for her home. 

She is currently requesting a loan to invest in buying a new food cart, chairs, disposable utensils and supplies such as corn, flour, and oil in large quantities. 

For this woman, nothing is impossible. She wants to keep working and fulfill her dream of formalizing her business so that in the future she can leave it for her children. With your help, Omaira will be able to follow her dreams. Go ahead, make a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new food cart, chairs, disposable utensils and supplies like corn, flour and oil in large quantities.

loans.name: Tony Angel

texts.es:
Tony, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y aún no tienen hijos.

Tony, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería desde muy pequeño, estas actividades las aprendió con sus hermanos mayores y con su papá, siempre se ha dedicado a estas actividades y la parcela donde tiene sus cultivos, se encuentra ubicada a 20 minutos en vehículo desde su casa y las milpas las trabaja con sus hermanos.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para la sembrar maíz.

Sus sueños son comprar un terreno para poder sembrar maíz, porque donde siembra tiene que alquilar.
texts.en:
Tony is 29 years old; he attended school up to high school level. He has a domestic partner who cares for the household chores and they don't yet have any children.

Tony has worked in the agriculture and livestock field from very young age. He learned these skills alongside his older brothers and his dad. He has always worked doing this. 

The plot of land he farms at is located about a 20 ride from his home and his brother’s fields, which he also helps to work.
The loan will be used to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides for growing corn.
His dream is to buy land where he can sow corn, since he is renting the plot of land he is presently using.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides for growing corn

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell seaweed business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy seedlings of various seaweed and a plastic rope for her business.

Judith has been in this business for two years. Judith earns more income from fishing.

She has sustained her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional seedlings of seaweeds and plastic rope.

loans.name: Luna

texts.en:
Luna is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Luna is 54 years old and has one school going child.

Luna has a raising pigs business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to buy feed and supplies to raise her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to build her business.

Luna has been in this business for three years. Luna would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marita is 53 years old and has one child in school.

Marita has a videoke rental business in the Philippines. Marita requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy a microphone and other materials needed for her business.

Marita has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, Marita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a microphone and other materials needed for her business.

loans.name: Emmaculada

texts.en:
Emmaculada is 57 years old and married with three children. Emmaculada works very hard to provide for them.

Emmaculada runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, personal product care, home product care, and other groceries.

Emmaculada has been in this business for six years. 

In the future, Emmaculada would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Geralyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Geralyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming seaweed. Geralyn is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials like wood, paint, bamboo, etc for her fishing business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Geralyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like wood, paint, and bamboo

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Chata est une ménagère âgée de 60 ans, se tenant près du sac noix de néré avec un panier de sou-bala en main. Elle vit au Mali avec son mari  et ses enfants au nombre de 6 dont 2 écoliers. Depuis 10 ans, elle exerce le petit commerce et le stockage de la noix de nérés dont le bénéfice lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins notamment la scolarisation de ses enfants et le financement du champ familial. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants et vend ses marchandises aux marchés environnants. Elle a un bénéfice prévisionnel  mensuel d’environ 20 000 FCFA qui peut varier en fonction de la période.
Elle est très appréciée dans sa communauté pour son courage et sa bravoure. Elle souhaiterait dans l’avenir acquérir une machine décortiqueuse et amélioré son habitat.
La difficulté majeure de son activité réside dans son système de commercialisation à cause de la distance qui la sépare du marché.
texts.en:
Chata is a housewife, 60 years old, who is standing in the photo near a bag of néré nuts and holding a basket of sou-bala [cooking condiment made from pounded and fermented seeds or nuts]. She lives in Mali with her husband and her six children, of whom two are in elementary school.

For ten years, Chata has been operating a small-scale business and stocking néré nuts. The profit from her work enables her to cover her costs, especially her children’s schooling and the financing of the family farm. She gets her supplies from nearby markets and sells her goods there too. She has a projected monthly profit of about 20,000 francs CFA that can vary according to the calendar.

Chata is much appreciated in her community for her courage and bravery. For the future, she would like to acquire a shelling machine and to improve her dwelling. The main difficulty in her work is in sales, since she is located far from the market.

loans.use: to purchase néré nuts to make Sou-bala

loans.name: Alexandru

texts.ru: Александр молодой парень в возрасте 19 лет, не женат, проживающий в городе Soroca. Выпускник профессиональное училище города Drochia. Узнав, что Крепость Soroca будет отремонтирована, решил открыть бизнес в сфере туризма. 16 мая 2015 Крепость Soroca открыла свои двери для посетителей, где Александр и открыл киоск для туристов прямо возле крепости. В киоске можно купить сувениры, футболки с фотографию Крепостью Сорока, сувенирные монеты, которые чеканятся на месте, матрица сделана на заказ. Также имеет мини тир, стрельба из арбалета и лука. Александр ежедневно обслуживает около 100-300 туристов из Moldova и других стран. В будущем планирует сделать на заказ 2 комплекта доспех, меч, булаву, копья и лук. Наймёт на работу двух ребят для реализации его плана. Ребята будут одеты в доспехах и с оружием в руках. Для всего, Александру нужны деньги, поэтому он просит этот кредит. Этот кредит поможет к развитию бизнеса и новых рабочих мест для молодежи.
texts.en: Alexandru is a young guy, 19 years old. He is single and lives in the city of Soroca. He graduated from vocational school in Drochia. Upon learning that the ancient keep in Soroca will be renovated, he decided to open a tourism business. On May 16, 2015 Soroca Fortress opened its doors to visitors, and Alexandru opened a souvenir kiosk right outside the fortress. At the kiosk you can buy souvenirs, T-shirts with a photo of Soroca Fortress, souvenir coins (which were minted on the site). Also there is a small shooting range, where one can shoot a crossbow and bow. Every day, Alexandru serves about 100-300 tourists from Moldova and other countries. In the future, he plans to make 2 sets of armor, with a sword, mace, spear and bow. He will hire two guys to work. The guys will be dressed in armor and with weapons in their hands. To do all of this, Alexandru needs money, so he is asking for this loan. This loan will help development this business and create jobs for young people.

loans.use: to buy two sets of medieval armor.

loans.name: Peruth

texts.en:
Peruth aged 36, lives in kololo-Kyangwali, She is like most women who had viable business ideas but not enough capital to start her dream retail business. That is until she joined Ugafode, where she attained training on how to establish and manage a profitable business.

Peruth is married to Deo and they look after three children aged eigjht, five and two respectively. Two attend school going, and she does not have any dependents.

After the training, Peruth now wants to borrow ugx2,000,000 to hire workers to clear land and plant maize and beans, now that the rains are almost starting. She also wants to acquire more land for farming because she dreams of educating all her children. 

Her additional income from her retail shop is too minimal to support her family. She faces challenges like weather changes especially heavy rains and prolonged droughts.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and hire workers.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Her name is Marites, 43, resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Johnny, a driver and has five children of which three are in High School, one is in Elementary school and the other one is already working. Living in a third world country, it is a challenge to make ends meet.

To augment their income, Marites started up a laundry shop four years ago to help her husband make a living. Aside from her laundry shop she also has a barbecue business. Most couples who go to the office just visit the laundry shop weekly to have their clothes, bed sheets, and towels cleaned. It saves them time, money and effort. Their laundry bags are replaced almost every week. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operation of her business, she is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan to buy a new washing machine. She needs an additional machine to serve more customers. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and the financial help that will be extended to her for it will surely help cover their daily needs and send her children to school.

Marites' dream is to see all her children finish College. She also aims to grow her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for a washing machine to use for her laundry services.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing to resell.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Nora is 43 years old and both of her children are in school.

Nora has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Nora requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Nora has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Nora would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purhase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 42 years old, married and has three children. One attends school.

Emily is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Emily requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Emily has raised pigs for six years now, and has borrowed eight times from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Emily would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Precille

texts.en:
Precille is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Precille is 39 years old and has two children who attend school.

Precille sells personal care products in the Philippines. 

Precille requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase items like underwear, body lotion, perfume, beauty soap and other personal care products.

Precille has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase personal care products to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Elizabeth works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store, She also raises pigs.  

Elizabeth is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase fish to make dried fish for her business. She successfully paid back her previous loan.

Elizabeth has sustained her business through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream; to save money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Vinia

texts.en:
Vinia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net, gasoline, etc for her fishing business.

Vinia has been in this business for 29 years. Vinia earns more income from buying and selling fish.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Vinia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of sending her children to college and save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net, gasoline, etc.

loans.name: Rosette

texts.en:
Rosette is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rosette is 48 years old and has four children who attend school.

Rosette has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell.

Rosette has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Zaida

texts.en:
Zaida is 61 years old and married with three children.

She is in agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Zaida is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Zaida has been in this business for five years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly to attainment her dream: to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies,

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es:
Con el claro objetivo de comprar vivienda la señora María emprendió un proyecto en el año 1998 el cual era volver independiente y montar un negocio de confección para generar mayores ingresos y hoy en dái sigue en pie trabajando para lograrlo.

María trabaja entre 10 y 12 horas diarias, este largo horario se debe a la falta de maquinaria que le permita agilizar los procesos de producción y como no ha tenido capital no ha logrado comprarla, pero María se siente afortunada que una entidad como Interactuar esté dispuesta a depositar su confianza en ella y junto con su aliado Kiva desea pedirles un enorme favor, el cual es, un aliento económico que necesita para comprar una maquina fileteadora, que, agilizara todos sus procesos de confección.
texts.en:
María undertook a project in 1998 with the clear objective of buying a home. The project was to become independent and set up a tailoring business to generate a higher income. Today she remains in place working towards it. 

María works between 10 to 12 hours every day. This long schedule is due to the lack of machinery that would speed up the production process and because María has not had the resources she hasn't been able to buy it. But María is fortunate that an entity like Interactuar is willing to put its trust in her together with its partnership with Kiva. She wants to ask a huge favor which is an economic encouragement she needs to buy a serging machine which will speed up all of her tailoring processes.

loans.use: to buy a serging machine to speed up and expand her production.

loans.name: Iqbal

texts.en:
Iqbal is a 50-year-old married woman. She is the mother of three children. She adores her family and her son works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. 

Her son started his own business of selling welding material 8 years ago. Iqbal is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her son. He will use the loan to increase his supply of welding products including iron rods, iron sheet, soldering rods, and welding rods so that he can respond more quickly to customer's needs. He plans to expand his business with the additional income he earns. Iqbal hopes that the loan will be helpful for her son's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her son with his welding business.

loans.name: Peri

texts.en:
Peri is 52 years old and married. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar region. She is a respected and strong woman.

Peri is a dairy farmer. She started keeping dairy cows two years ago. Thanks to her hard work, Peri has been able to improved and expanded her merchandise. 

Peri hasn’t got any children and considers her farm as family. She gives motherly care to her cows. 

Now Peri wants to buy a few sheep, because she will use their wool. In this way Peri believes her business will expand.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.en: Nargiza is a cheerful woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1986. She is living in a big busy city with her family. She is married and has three children. She has been doing business since 2008. She is a tailor. She sews beautiful traditional Tajik and European women's dresses at home. Patterns of ready-sewn dresses are perfect. She is well known among her neighbors and other tailors.  She has permanent customers and receives orders every day. She appealed to Kiva lenders asking for a loan to buy textiles to sew dresses. She is willing to be supported and has an efficient business.

loans.use: to buy textiles to sew dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cabbages, tomatoes, onions and carrots for selling.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Rosalinda is 52 years old and has two children who attend school.

Rosalinda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. Rosalinda has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
Georgina is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. in her general store.

Georgina industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like e-loading (mobile prepaid load).

Georgina dreams to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 60 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Merlita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell including canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and drinks. 

Merlita has been in this business for 8 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and drinks.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is 55 years old and married with one child. Monica works very hard to provide for them.

Monica runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, breads, shampoo, beauty soap and other personal care products.

Monica has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, breads, shampoo, beauty soap and other personal care products.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a married woman, 63 years old with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Narcisa has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Narcisa has been in this business for 30 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 52 years old and married with four children. Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned good and other groceries.

In the future, Teresa would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Hugo Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es un hombre de 39 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que a pesar de las circunstancias y momentos económicos difíciles por lo que ha pasado, nunca se ha rendido, día a día busca los medios para salir adelante con su familia conformada por dos menores y su pareja.

Su deseo es montar su propio negocio, una legrumbreria, es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo con el cual hará la compra de frutas, verduras y una mesa grande la cual adecuara para la venta de estos.

Se siente muy seguro ya que cuenta con la ayuda de Interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva, sabe que con su apoyo sus sueños se cumplirán
texts.en:
Fernando is a hardworking and humble 39-year-old man. In spite of the difficult economic circumstances and moments he has experienced, he has never given up. Every day he looks for ways to get ahead with his family which is made up of two children and his partner. 

He wants to set up his own business, a fruit and vegetable stand, which is why he is requesting a loan with which he will buy fruits, vegetables and a large table that he will tailor to sell these. He feels very safe because he has the help of Ineractuar and the collaborators from Kiva, he knows that with their help his dreams will be fulfilled.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables and a large table which he will tailor to sell these.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Kontien  veuve de 48 ans vie dans une commune rurale au mali avec son enfant non scolarisé, elle-même est analphabète. Son enfant est âgé de 20 ans.
Kontien espère toujours l’amélioration des conditions de  vie de l’enfant et de la famille  en santé et nourriture suffisante. Son activité est l’agriculture et à travers cette activité elle parvienne à assurer le bien-être de son enfant, avec une expérience de 5 ans Kontien  veut acheter 150kgs de semence d’arachide, plus frais de labour et autres intrants agricoles, c’est elle qui tient la houe sur la photo au bout. Elle fait recourt à l’IMF à cause du manque de moyen en semence et de labour. 
Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché local et écoule ses produis au même lieu au comptant. Le non abondance de pluie est un problème qui arrive sounent .
texts.en:
Kontien, a 48-year-old widow, lives in a rural commune in Mali with her child, who is not in school. She herself is illiterate. Her child is 20 years old. She still hopes to improve living conditions for him and her family in terms of healthcare and sufficient food. Kontien’s work is in agriculture. Through her business, she manages to ensure her child’s well-being. With five years of experience, she wants to pay for 150 kg of peanut seeds, plowing, and other farm inputs. 

Kontien is the one in the photo at the end and holding a hoe. She turned to the microfinance institution due to needing seeds and plowing. She gets her supplies at the big local market and sells her goods for cash at the same place. Limited rain is a problem which occurs often.

loans.use: to purchase seeds to make use of her fields

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa es una aplicada, trabajadora, responsable y honesta mujer de tan solo 19 años de edad, sorprendentemente se encuentra casada.
 
Ella se dedica a prestar sus servicios como manicurista, una actividad con la que ayuda a su esposo en los gastos de la casa, su principal sueño es encontrar una estabilidad económica y poder estudiar en un futuro.

En la foto aparecen todos los implementos con los que trabaja, pero ella no se detiene y quiere crecer, por ello se encuentra solicitando un apoyo económico para comprar una silla de manicura, una olla parafina y materiales para realizar uñas en acrílico.

El principal objetivo es lograr tener implementos para atender todas las necesidades y que sus clientes se sientan más cómodos
texts.en:
Luisa is a diligent, hard-working, responsible, and honest woman only 19 years of age, surprisingly already married.

She makes a living offering manicure services, a job through which she helps her husband with the household expenses. Her main dream is to achieve economic stability and be able to go to school in the future.

All of the supplies with which she works are pictured in the photo, but there is no stopping her -- she wants to grow. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy a manicure chair, a paraffin pan, and supplies to do acrylic nails.

Her main objective is to succeed in obtaining the supplies to address all necessities, and that her customers feel more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy a manicure chair, a paraffin pan, and supplies to do acrylic nails

loans.name: Sabounyouma Group

texts.fr: Une femme âgée de 48 ans Djouma,  mariée, ménagère vivant dans une commune rurale au Mali avec son mari cultivateur et ses 3 enfants âgés de 11 à 18 ans dont 2 scolarisés. L’activité de Djouma consiste à acheter les intrants agricoles (semences et autres) pour la culture d’arachide et en plus l’embouche. Pour bien mener  son activité, elle s’approvisionne au grand  marché  et fait ses  ventes au comptant au même lieu. Djouma  a plusieurs années d’expérience dans cette activité, ses ambitions tournent autour du bien-être de ses enfants en  éducation et la nourriture suffisante. Elle quitta l’école en huitième année fondamentale et se sert à assurer ses besoins par les profits générés  de son activité. Elle contracte le prêt enfin de bien mener son activité. La sécheresse pendant l’hivernage joue beaucoup sur le rendement des cultures.
texts.en:
Djouma, a 48-year-old woman, is a married homemaker living in a rural commune in Mali with her husband, a farmer, and her three children, from 11 to 18 years old, of whom two are in school. Djouma’s business involves buying farm inputs (seeds other items) for growing peanuts and raising livestock. To carry out her work, she gets her supplies at the big market and makes her sales for cash at the same location. She has several years of experience in this business. 

Her ambitions are centered on her children’s well-being, education, and food. She had dropped out of school in the 8th grade and used the profits generated from her business to support herself. She is taking out a loan to carry on with her work. Drought during the rainy season plays a big part in crop yields.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for her fields

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, leggings, etc., thus improving her family's quality of life

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.en:
Dilafruz is a confident woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1993. She is living in a mountainous district with her family. She is married and has one child. She is one of the participants of startup business training provided by IMON to its clients.
Dilafruz wants to start doing business by buying and keeping livestock because she has good conditions at home to keep livestock. She appealed to IMON asking for financial support from Kiva lenders to buy livestock and start doing business. She is willing to be supported by Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy livestock and start doing business

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy works hard to support her family. She is single with one child and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Mary Joy requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for 6 years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lilian, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta bachiller, no siguió estudiando porque se acompaño, ahora su pareja trabaja como motorista y tiene un hijo de 8 años de edad que está estudiando.

Lilian, desde hace 8 años se dedica a vender pupusas y comida, fue su suegra quien la motivo a que colocara este negocio, antes solo estudiaba, pero cuando se acompaño su suegra tenia un puesto donde vendía pupusas y fue así como ella lo aprendió y luego su suegra se lo dejo a ella para que lo atendiera; su negocio lo tiene a unas cuadras de su casa y su día comienza a las 4:00 a.m. porque vende desayunos y termina de vender a las 5:00 p.m.

El crédito sera invertido para comprar mesas, sillas y para comprar carne, quesillo y frijoles para las pupusas.

Su sueño es, ver a su hijo graduarse de una carrera universitaria y que sea un profesional de éxitos.
texts.en:
Lillian, 26 years old, studied until high school and didn't continue studying because she got into a relationship. Her partner now works as a driver. She has an eight-year-old son who is in school. 

Lilian has been selling pupusas and food for eight years. Her mother-in-law encouraged her to establish this business. Previously, she only went to school but when she got into an relationship, her mother-in-law had a food stall where she sold pupusas and this is how she learned. Afterwards, her mother-in-law left the business for Lilian to run. Her business is a few blocks from her home. She starts her day at 4:00am because she sells breakfasts and ends her day at 5:00pm. 

The loan will be invested in buying tables, chairs and in buying meat, cheese and beans for the pupusas. Her dream is to see her son graduate from university and that he'll be a successful professional.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs and to buy meat, cheese and beans for pupusas.

loans.name: Flamadew - Ton Group

texts.fr: Satio a élevé sa main au bout sur la photo. Une femme âgée de 54 ans Satio est veuve, elle est  embouche use vivante  dans une commune rurale au mali avec ses 2 enfants tous scolarisés. Son activité économique consiste à acheter  les animaux maigres, les engraissés et les revendre. Pour bien mener  son activité, elle s’approvisionne au  marché public et fait ses  ventes au comptant au même lieu. Satio a plusieurs d’années d’expérience dans cette activité, ses ambitions tournent autour de ses enfants en soins médicaux, éducation et la nourriture suffisante. Elle est analphabète cela ne lui empêche pas de pratiquer cette activité et se sert à assurer ses besoins par les profits générés  de son activité. Pour acheter plus d’animaux, Satio a fait recourt à l’IMF et n’a rencontré aucun problème.
texts.en:
Satio is the one with a hand raised in the photo. She is a 48-year-old woman, a widow, and a livestock farmer living in a rural commune in Mali with her two children, both provided with education. Her business involves buying underweight animals, fattening them, and then reselling them. To carry out her work, she gets her supplies at the public market and makes her sales for cash at the same location. She has several years of experience in this business.  

Her ambitions are centered on her children’s medical care, education, and food. She herself is illiterate, although it does not prevent her from operating this business. She uses the profits generated from it to support herself. To purchase more animals, Satio has turned to the microfinance institution and has not encountered any problems at all.

loans.use: to purchase underweight animals, feed them and then sell them later

loans.name: Pierre Ulysse

texts.fr: Ulysse, âgé de 40 ans, est marié et père de 3 enfants. Cela fait déjà 11 ans qu’il a ouvert une boutique de produits alimentaires et boissons gazeuses tout près de chez lui. L’une des plus anciennes boutiques de la zone. De nombreux clients viennent tous les jours faire leurs achats dans sa boutique. Il désire augmenter ses revenus et pouvoir épargner pour les études de ses enfants. Voulant exploiter les avantages qu’il a dans sa zone, il sollicite un microcrédit afin d’augmenter son stock pour mieux répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Ulysse is 40 years old,  married and has three children. It has been 11 years already since he opened a store to sell groceries and soft drinks not far from his home. His store has been in existence longer than most stores in the neighborhood. Many customers shop there every day. 

Ulysse would like to increase his revenues and be able to save up for his children's education.  Wishing to take advantage of his standing in his neighborhood, he is seeking a microloan in order to expand his store and better meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy cases of soft drinks and stock up on rice.

loans.name: Mariama Idrissa's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré le 16 Mai 2011, ce banc villageois est composé de femmes du groupement du village qui ont adhéré dans le programme afin de rendre les activités dans le petit commerce plus rentables, elles s’activent également dans l’agriculture sous pluie. Une bonne ambiance anime les rencontres du groupe. 

Madame Mariama Idrissa , âgée de 52 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 02 garçons et 05 filles. Elle est restauratrice.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 03 sac de riz à 13500f le sac, de l’huile d’une valeur de 10000f des légumes et d’autres condiments et après cuisson revendre ses plats en détails.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte nourrir sa famille.
texts.en:
Inaugurated on May 16, 2011, this 'banc villageois' is composed of groups of village women, who joined the program to make their small-scale businesses more profitable. The women are also active in rainy-season farming. A nice ambiance facilitates the group meetings. 

Ms. Mariama Idrissa, aged 52, is the one standing at the far right with a hand raised. She is the featured borrower of the group. A married woman, she is the mother of seven children (2 boys and 5 girls). She is a restauranteur. 

With this new loan, she intends to purchase 3 sacks of rice at 13,500 francs per sack; some oil worth 10,000 francs; some vegetables; and other condiments for cooking and selling her meals at the retail level. With the profits, she plans on feeding her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, vegetables, and other condiments for her restaurant

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es:
Eladio tiene 64 años de eda, vive con su conyuge en su propia casa en el Distrito de Buenos Aires de Morropon, que cuenta con servicios básicos de agua y luz, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a preparación de pan, en un horno artesanal que el mismo ha construido en su domicilio, para luego distribuirlo en los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar la infraestructura de su horno y de esta manera tener mejor productividad de su negocio, mejorar sus niveles de ingresos, y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eladio is 64 years old. He lives with his partner in his own home in the district of Buenos Aires of Morropon. The home has basic water and electricity services. The people here make a living in agriculture, business and livestock. It is located in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru. 
Eladio makes a living preparing bread in an artesian oven that he built himself in his home. He then distributes the bread to the neighboring houses in his district. He is asking for a loan to buy construction materials to improve the infrastructure of his oven and thus have better productivity in his business, improve his income level and his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve the infrastructure of his oven.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system.

loans.name: Roberto Eduardo

texts.es:
Roberto, de 52 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado, su esposa de dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 5 hijos de 28, 22, 20, 18 y 16 años de edad, pero solo 3 de ellos viven con ellos, porque los demás están acompañados. 

Roberto, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 40 años, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió porque sus padres solo ha eso se dedicaron toda la vida; ahora sus parcelas están a 3 kilómetros de su casa y sus 3 hijos le ayudan a trabajar en los cultivos desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar 12 quintales de fertilizante y comprar gasolina para el motor de riego.

Su sueño es, poder comprar su propio terreno, para que sus hijos puedan construir ahí sus viviendas en un futuro.
texts.en:
Roberto is 52 years old, studied up to the sixth grade, and is married. His wife dedicates herself to domestic tasks; they have five children ages 28, 22, 20, 18 and 16, but only three of their children live with them because the others are in relationships. Roberto has made a living in agriculture for 40 years; he learned everything he knows because his parents devoted their entire lives to farming. His lands are currently 3 kilometers from his home, and his three children help him to work in the fields from 6:00 am until 6:00 pm.

The loan will be used to buy 12 quintals of fertilizer and to buy gasoline for the irrigation motor. His dream is to be able to buy his own land so that his children will be able to build their own home in the future.

loans.use: to buy 12 quintals of fertilizer and to buy gasoline for the irrigation motor.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 20-year-old single man from the city of Khan Younis. He lives with his family in a small house. Mohammad has a rickshaw which he uses for transporting and distributing goods. It is a good business and provides him with a good income.
Mohammad requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw for his business. This will enable him to increase his productivity and also his income.
Mohammad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for his business.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a 43-year-old man from Kisumu and a married man. He supports three people in his family.

Fredrick repairs vehicles, an activity he has been doing for the last 10 years and that generates a monthly income of 30,000 KES.  He has requested his second loan with VisionFund Kenya which he will use to purchase more tools and a toolbox which will help him generate more income to support his family. 

He will use the anticipated profits to put back into the business. His dream is to have a stable source of income.

loans.use: to purchase more tools and a toolbox which will help him generate more income to support his family.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is the age of 45 and she is the mother of five children. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a house wife and looks after her family at home. Her son provides medical facilities to the people who do not have the power to afford allopathic medicine. He can treat against minor diseases also at very low service charges and provides herbal medicines according to his experience. In this way, he gets some income to run his house as well.
He is very famous in his area due to his kindness, this is the reason the demand for herbal medicine has been increasing and he needs to buy more herbal medicine to cope with the demand. He wants to buy herbal medicine in bulk but does not have enough capital to invest because he has to spend a large part of savings over household expenses.
Therefore, Shamim requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. Shamim hopes that the lenders would support her for her son's noble work.

loans.use: to aid her son in his medicinal business.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel es un hombre trabajador de 41 años de edad que se gana la vida humildemente apoyado en su negocio de venta de ropa y productos de belleza, contando con el apoyo de su compañera de vida en la venta de dichos productos, además él se dedica a  prestar sus servicios de albañil de forma independiente, obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos. Manuel hace 3 años logro construir su humilde vivienda en la que habita junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de 10 meses de edad. Manuel desea mejorar sus ventas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lociones, cremas de manos y cuerpo, maquillaje, desodorantes, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, etc., y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Manuel is a 41 year old worker who makes a living by humbly leaning on his business selling clothing and beauty products. He counts on the support of his partner in selling these products. He also lends his mason services independently, getting better income. 3 years ago, Manuel built his modest house where he lives with his partner and 10 month old little girl. Manuel wants to improve his sales, so he is asking for a credit from FUSAI to invest in lotions, hand and body creams, makeup, deodorants, pants, blouses, shirts, etc., and thus improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in lotions, hand and body creams, makeup, deodorants, pants, blouses, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 20-year-old single man from Irbid city. He tried to work in addition to studying but he could not find a suitable job. He is a student in the university majoring in Maintenance of Heritage Resources. He wants to complete his studies and find a good job.

Mohammad is a member of a big family that has financial problems and his father cannot cover the education fees in addition to the household expenses. Therefore, Mohammad applied for an education loan to help him pay his university fees for this semester and buy the books that he needs.

Mohammad is dreaming about the day that he will finish his education and find a good job to be able to help his father with the household expenses.

loans.use: to pay his university fees for this semester and to buy the books that he needs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is a married woman, 57 years old.

Lourdes has a egg retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more trays of eggs to sell.

Lourdes has been in this business for 4 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more trays of eggs to sell.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a young married woman. She is in her 20s and lives in Southern Ghour with her husband. She is an example of a lady who has willpower and patience.

She decided to be a productive woman and started her own business with a small quantity of clothes to sell. And now that she believes that her business is working well, she decided to expand and develop her work. Therefore, she applied for a loan to buy a larger quantity of clothes to sell and increase her income. She hopes in the future to open an independent clothes shop.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of clothes to sell

loans.name: Herihaingo

texts.fr:
Herihaingo est une femme très courageuse et dynamique de 40 ans. Elle est veuve, son mari est décédé il y a maintenant 5 ans. De ce fait, elle a la responsabilité d'élever toute seule ses trois enfants qui sont âgés de 10 à 18 ans. Actuellement, ces derniers sont tous inscrits dans des écoles privées.
Pour soutenir et entretenir ses enfants, elle exerce une activité de vente en détail des ustensiles de cuisine en plastique et en inox, et des sandales. Elle y était depuis son mariage. Au début, elle commençait avec les ustensiles en pastiques seulement, et puis en 2001, pour améliorer le revenu, elle proposait aussi d'autres articles, les sandales et les ustensiles en inox. C'est la seule source de revenu de la famille, donc c'est tout à fait logique si elle voudrait coûte que coûte le développer et l'étendre davantage, d'où la raison de sa demande de crédit.
texts.en:
Herihaingo is a very courageous and energetic woman, 40 years old, and a widow. Her husband died five year ago. Because of this, she alone is responsible for raising her three children, aged 10 to 18. Currently, the children are all in private schools. To support her children, she has had a retail business selling sandals and plastic or stainless kitchen utensils since she was married. 

At first, she began with only plastic items. Then in 2001, to improve her revenues, she also offered other items, sandals, and stainless utensils. This is the family’s only source of revenue, so it only makes sense if she would, at all costs, like to develop her business and expand it more. This is the reason behind her request for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase plastic kitchen utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 25 pounds of shrimp concentrate for her pond.

loans.name: Hadeel

texts.en:
Hadeel is 22 years old and is studying for a degree in Arabic Language. She lives in West Irbid with her family and is one of six siblings. Hadeel is working really hard to get ahead and to grow.
Hadeel dreams of having a good job so that she can help to pay for her daily expenses and help her family in their household expense. She has requested this loan to pay for her educational expenses so that she can continue her education and achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to pay for her educational expenses so that she can continue her education

loans.name: Théogène

texts.fr:
Théogène est un brave père de famille de 38 ans. Il vie merveilleusement bien avec sa femme et son fils unique de 6 ans dans leur propre maison, construite par leurs propres efforts.
Il dirige un magasin général depuis 2007 pour gagner sa vie et il y est aidé par sa femme. Auparavant, il était commerçant de charbons en bois, mais ça ne lui rapportait pas beaucoup à cause des concurrents.
Son magasin se situe dans un bon emplacement, et il n'y a pas de concurrents alarmants aux alentours. Son affaire marche très bien donc. Pour pouvoir gagner beaucoup plus de revenu, il voudrait encore le développer et l'étendre, renforcer le fonds de roulement, ce qui explique sa demande de crédit. Son prochain projet est de faire une extension de sa maison et la faire louer.
texts.en:
Théogène is a good and honest father, 38 years old, who has a wonderful life with his wife and only son, aged 6, in their own house built through their own efforts. Théogène has been running a general store since 2007 to earn a living. His wife helps him at the store. 

In the past, he was a charcoal merchant. But this did not bring in much money due to the competition. His store is located in a good location, and there is no alarming competition thereabouts. So his business is doing very well. 

To be able to earn more income, he would still like to develop his business and expand it and to bolster his working capital. This explains his request for a loan. His next project is to build an addition to his house and rent it out.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, salt, corn,  canned drinks, etc.

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es:
Astrid es una mujer de 39 años de edad, se dedico inicialmente al negocio de las confecciones en el cual duro tres años como operaria, después de pasar este periodo de tiempo inicio manejando un taller con un amigo el cual le enseño el oficio y la guiaba en todo el proceso para adquirir su propio negocio. 


Vive con su hijo. Hace poco tiempo es una mujer independiente que gracias a los micro créditos tiene la posibilidad de ser su propia jefe y generar un empleo pues su pecera es reconocida por su buen servicio al cliente; solicita el crédito para la compra de una maquina recubridora y una fileteadora, pues tiene un muy buen espacio el cual por la falta de capital no es aprovechado de la mejor manera, su principal sueño es tener un taller con muy buena producción, cómodo agradable.
texts.en:
Astrid is a 39-year-old woman. She initially earned a living in sewing for three years, working as a sewing machine operator. After that she started managing a workshop with a friend who taught her the job and guided her in the process of starting her own business. 

Astrid lives with her son. She has been an independent woman for a while; thanks to the microloans she has the opportunity to be her own boss and to create employment, since her shop is known for its good customer service. She is asking for the loan to buy a recovering machine and an overlocking sewing machine, as she has a very good space that she isn't taking advantage of due to a lack of capital. Her biggest dream is to have a comfortable, pleasant workshop with very good production.

loans.use: to buy a recovering machine and an overlocking sewing machine

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan  vive en una comunidad de Olanchito, Honduras tiene 42 años y se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y hortalizas desde hace 20 años, tiene muchos objetivos en la vida tales como, trabajar muy duro para darles a sus hijos una buena educación  y que estos sean profesionales, además anhela  tener una cría de cerdos, y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es por esto último que solicita financiamiento a Soluz Honduras para adquirir un sistema solar, ya que hasta el momento la vida en el hogar ha sido muy difícil, porque sin acceso a energía eléctrica han tenido que invertir mucho en la compra de velas y lámparas de mano, con el objetivo de tener una mejor iluminación, su esposa tiene dificultades por las mañanas ya que el cómo agricultor necesita salir temprano de casa para sus labores, y debido a la falta de iluminación a su esposa se le hace difícil poder ayudarle en esta tarea. Lo mismo sucede con los niños ya que necesitan prepararse muy temprano para asistir a la escuela y por las noches no han podido hacer sus tareas o estudiar cuando es necesario. Con el sistema solar que tendrá la familia todos estos problemas quedaran atrás.
texts.en:
Juan lives in a community of Olanchito, Honduras. He is 42 years old and has made a living growing basic grains and vegetables for 20 years. He has many goals in life such as: working very hard to give his children a good education and that they become professionals, having baby pigs, and giving his family a better quality of life. It is because of that last one that he is asking for funding from Soluz Honduras to get a solar system, because so far life at home has been very difficult. Without access to electricity, they have had to invest a lot into buying candles and hand lamps, in order to have better lighting. 

His wife has difficulties in the mornings, since with him being a farmer, he needs to leave the house early for his work and due to the lack of lighting, his wife finds it hard to help him. The same happens with the children because they need to get ready very early to get to school and at night they have not been able to do their homework or study when they need to. With the solar system that the family will get, all of these problems will be left behind.

loans.use: to buy a solar system to will greatly benefit his family's quality of life.

loans.name: Moataz

texts.en: Moataz is a single man living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. He is studying to get his bachelor's degree in solar energy technology and he is now in his third year. The income that comes from his father’s job is income for his family that consists of five members. Recently his father has faced some problems that led Moataz to apply for an educational loan to help him cover his semester fees. Moataz's future plan is to work in the same field.

loans.use: to help him cover his semester fees

loans.name: Edilson Francisco

texts.es:
Edilson Francisco tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población se dedica al cultivo de algodón y arroz, así como al comercio de animales pequeños y ganadería.

Edilson tiene una bodega en su domicilio en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros. El ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para incremetar su stock como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frutas y verduras, con esto Edilson espera ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y satisfacer sus gustos y preferencias lo que le va a permitir generar ingresos adicionales y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edilson Francisco is 53 years old. He lives with his family in a rural area of the Oyotún district, located in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The people here make a living growing cotton and rice, as well as in small animal trade and livestock. 

Edilson has a store in his home where he sells staple items such as rice, sugar, oil, and others. He is asking for a loan to buy a larger quantity of products to increase his stock such as rice, sugar, oil, fruits and vegetables. With this, Edilson hopes to offer a better variety of products to his customers and to satisfy their likes and preferences, which will allow him to get additional income and therefore improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products to increase his stock.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 47 years old, married and has five children.

Fe is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Fe has been in this business for 10 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 53 years old and has six children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Julieta is in the agricultural business, raising ducks in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her ducks.

Julieta has been in this business for 13 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her ducks.

loans.name: Pedro Felix

texts.es:
Pedro, estudio hasta segundo grado debido a falta de recursos económicos y la pobreza de sus padres, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene hijos pero no viven con ellos en casa, ya que cada uno de ellos tienen su propio hogar.

Pedro, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, pero además trabaja de vigilante en una fabrica, la agricultura y la ganadería la aprendió desde hace varios años cuando aún era pequeño.

El préstamo sera invertido para comprar ganado bovino.

Pedro, siempre ha soñado con tener mucho ganado.
texts.en: Pedro went to school until the second grade due to lack of money and his parent's poverty. He is married and his wife makes a living in household chores. He has children but they do not live with him in his house as each one has their own home. Pedro makes a living in agriculture and livestock, but he also works as a watchman in a factory. He learned agriculture and livestock many years ago when he was still young. The loan will be invested into buying cattle. Pedro has always dreamt of having a lot of cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.es:
La Señora Alberta vive y trabaja en Colomi, de estado civil casada, tiene 5 hijos dependientes de ella que estudian en el colegio. Se dedica a la actividad de agricultura conjuntamente con la familia, produciendo papa y oca como los principales productos agrícolas de mayor demanda en el mercado. Los ingresos económicos obtiene a través de la producción y venta de papa y oca que son también el sustento para su alimentación (auto consumo). La señora Alberta requiere un préstamo para la compra de abono orgánico (gallinaza) 1.5 camiones, semilla de papa (12 cargas), productos agroquímicos y herramientas agrícolas, gastos de tractor agrícola y pago al personal eventual.
Por último, la señora Alberta se sintió contenta al tener la oportunidad de acceder a un préstamo que se adecue a sus necesidades; porque con la compra de insumos agrícolas, incrementará la producción  y tendrá mayores ventas que mejorará su nivel de vida y su situación social en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Alberta lives and works in Colomi. She is married and has 5 dependent children who are in school. She makes a living in agriculture jointly with the family, producing potato and oca which are also the sustenance for food (self-consumption). Alberta needs a loan to buy 1.5 trucks of organic fertilizer (hen droppings), 12 loads of potato seeds, agriculture chemicals and tools, agriculture tractor expenses and to pay temporary staff. 

Alberta was happy to have the opportunity to access a loan that suits her needs because with the purchase of agricultural supplies, she will increase her production and will have better sales that will improve her standard of living and her social situation for the benefit of her family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, potato seeds, agriculture chemicals and tools to grow her business and have better income for her family.

loans.name: Karina Paola

texts.es: Karina de 22 años es una joven comerciante que se inició en esta actividad por una tía, ella le dio la oportunidad de vender mercancías y tiempo después se independizó, en la actualidad cuenta con tres años en esta labor. Ella ofrece a sus amigos, vecinos y familiares, exclusivamente prendas de vestir como jeans, camisetas y blusas. Semanalmente llega hasta las casas de sus clientes para mostrarles la mercancía, pero ella considera que si el surtido que oferta fuera mayor, podría vender mucho más, por eso está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar jeans, blusas, camisas y demás encargos de sus clientes.  Su meta a futuro es tener un local e inaugure un almacén de ropa, así mismo desea casarse y conformar una familia.
texts.en: Karina is 22 years old and a young merchant who started this job because of her aunt. She gave her the opportunity to sell merchandise and she later became independent. Now she has been doing this work for 3 years. She exclusively offers her friends, neighbors and family members items of clothing such as jeans, shirts and blouses. Weekly, she goes to her customer's houses to show them the merchandise but she knows that if the assortment that she offers were better, she could sell much more. For that reason, she is asking for her first Credikiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy jeans, blouses, shirts and other orders from her customers. Her future goal is to have a place and open a clothing store, as well as getting married and starting a family.

loans.use: to buy jeans, blouses, shirts and other orders from her customers.

loans.name: Luisa Delia

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer muy emprendedora y tenaz, con grandes deseos que ha estado cultivando y tratando de cumplir.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación y venta de alimentos en su restaurante.

Con esta actividad intenta día a día  salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia compuesta por su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes son el motor de su vida y su motivación para luchar diariamente.

Su mayor dificultad es la competencia del sector, pero con su gran capacidad de trabajo es capaz de sostenerse y progresar.

Luisa solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de insumos para la preparación de alimentos como carne, verduras, entre otros.

Con tu ayuda Luisa Podrá pagar la educación de sus dos hijos que es uno de sus más grandes sueños!
texts.en: Luisa is a very entrepreneurial and tenacious woman, who has has big dreams that she has been growing and trying to achieve. She has a small business of preparing and selling foods in her restaurant. With this job, she tries day-by-day to get ahead and improve her family's living conditions. She has a husband and two children who are the engine of her life and her motivation to fight daily. Her biggest difficulty is the competition in the area, but with her great work capacity, she is capable of keeping herself up and progressing. Luisa is asking for a loan to buy supplies for food preparation such as meat, vegetables and others. With your help, Luisa will be able to pay her two children's education which is one of her biggest dreams!

loans.use: to buy supplies for food preparation such as meat, vegetables and others.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 42 años de edad vive con su esposo y es madre de dos hijos.  
Desde hace tiempo, ella comenzó a laborar en el campo de la confección, pues le colaboraba a una Tía que tenía una empresa grande y allí se encargaba de pulir y revisar las prendas, cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad fue vinculada a la empresa, donde laboró por algunos años. 

Hace aproximadamente 20 años, Luz se independizó y montó su taller con gran empuje; afianzó su taller con la esperanza de que las ventas aumentaran y así fue, comenzó a conseguir contratos con terceros. De esta forma ha obtenido los ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 

Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar una máquina recubridora, con el fin de brindarle a sus clientes una prenda bien elaborada y con excelente terminación, así aumentará los contratos y podrá generar mayores ingresos para poder cumplir el sueño de tener una línea propia, además de brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras  personas. 

Ella sabe que Interactuar es un gran apoyo para el crecimiento de su empresa!
texts.en:
Luz, at 42 years of age, lives with her husband and is the mother of two children.

She started to work in the field of dressmaking a long time ago. She collaborated with an aunt who had a large business and there she was in charge of putting the final touches on the clothing and inspecting it. When she became an adult she was tied in with the business where she worked for some years.

Approximately 20 years ago, Luz became independent and with great effort started her own shop. She established her shop with the hope that her sales would increase and that was what happened. She began to get contracts with third parties. In this way, she has obtained income to support her family.

With the loan that she requests she wants to buy a coverstitch sewing machine in order to provide her customers with well made garments and excellent finishes. In this way, her contracts will increase and she will generate greater income in order to achieve her dream and have her own line, in addition to providing employment opportunities to other people.

She knows that Interactuar is a great support for the growth of her business!

loans.use: to buy a coverstitch sewing machine in order to provide her customers with well made garments.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is 45 years old and lives in Kasoga-Kyangwali.  He has had a viable business but he didn’t have enough capital to grow it to a better level. He now knows about Ugafode's financial services that help to support low income entrepreneurs. 

Godfrey is into goat selling, a business he has been doing since 2000.  He is married to Malita and they look after 5 children aged between 19 and 5.  All of the children go to school.

After the training, he now wants to borrow a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to purchase goats, hire laborers to clear the ground, and buy seedlings to plant more maize, coffee and beans now that the season is on.  He dreams of improving his family’s living standards. His additional income from growing maize and beans is too seasonal and thus unreliable. With this loan, Godfrey anticipates a big boost in his business and so more income to meet his family needs.

loans.use: to purchase goats, seeds and hire labor workers.

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es:
Hernán es un joven de 28 años, soltero,  se dedica totalmente a la agricultura especialmente a la producción de café 100% orgánico, y productos hortícolas también orgánicos,  dado a las bajas producciones de café derivadas de la afección de hongo de la roya en los cafetales Hernán desea diversificar el origen de sus ingresos por lo que quiere construir un invernadero para producir tomates orgánicos los cuales puede comercializar por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socio.
La producción de tomate orgánico en invernadero es una actividad novedosa y con excelente mercado nacional, “La oportunidad es muy buena y por eso la quiero aprovechar para poder tener un ingreso extra” Dice Hernán.
Su mayor sueño personal es  formar un pequeño patrimonio para que cuando llegue la hora de casarse y tener hijos estos puedan tener mejores oportunidades, es por eso que se esfuerza a diario para poder obtener ingresos que le ayuden a salir adelante, con las ganancias del crédito Hernan espera poder comprar materiales para construir su casa y ayudar a las necesidades de sus padres. 
Un crédito ayudará a Hernán a tener más oportunidades para superarse y ayudar a sus padres a tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hernán is 28 years old. He is single and completely dedicates himself to agriculture, especially to the production of 100% organic coffee and organic vegetables. Given the low production of coffee derived from the condition of rust fungus in the coffee plants, Hernán wants to diversify the origin of his income, so he wants to build a greenhouse to produce organic tomatoes, which he can sell through COCAFCAL where he is a member. 

The production of organic tomatoes in a greenhouse is a new occupation and has an excellent national market. "The opportunity is very good and for that reason I want to take advantage of it to be able to have extra income," says Hernán. His biggest personal dream is to create a small legacy so that when it comes time for him to get married and have kids, they can have better opportunities. For that reason, he pushes himself every day to be able to get an income that helps him to get ahead. With the earnings from the loan, Hernán hopes to be able to buy materials to build his house and to help his parents and their needs. A loan will help Hernán to have more opportunities to improve himself and to help his parents have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the materials needed to build a greenhouse, such as an antivirus blanket, coconut fiber, tomato plants and organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Adeline

texts.fr: Adeline, 32 ans, est mère de deux enfants. Elle est mariée et vit avec son mari et les enfants à Port-au-Prince. Elle a démarré son entreprise en vendant des produits alimentaires et des boissons gazeuses chez elle. Cela fait déjà 7 ans qu’elle s’adonne à cette activité. Apres plusieurs démarches pour avoir un microcrédit, Palmis l’a soutenue pour améliorer le lieu de son activité pour attirer plus de clients. Son dernier prêt lui a servi à augmenter son stock pour pouvoir réaliser plus de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Adeline, 32 years old, is the mother of two children. She is married and lives with her husband and children in Port-au-Prince. She began her business selling food products and carbonated beverages out of her home.
She has dedicated herself to this business for 7 years now. After several steps toward obtaining a microloan, Palmis supported her improving her business location in order to attract more customers. Her last loan helped her to increase her inventory and make more profit.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of carbonated beverages and spices.

loans.name: Jehad

texts.en:
Jehad is studying in the university majoring in special education. After he succeeded in high school, Jehad was not able to enter the public university because of his low rate. Therefore, he decided to work alongside his studies so that he could enter one of the private universities and pay for his education.

Lately, his family has faced some financial problems, Jehad had to help them and give them his semester fees due to his sense of responsibility towards his family. Because of that, he had to apply for an education loan to be able to pay for the university fees and complete his semester.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees and complete his semester.

loans.name: Monicile

texts.fr: Monicile est âgée de 38 ans. Divorcée et mère d’un enfant, elle tient une boutique de produits alimentaires et cosmétiques qui lui permet d'élever seule son enfant. Monicile sollicite un microcrédit pour augmenter ses stocks de marchandises et pouvoir ainsi vendre davantage. Elle souhaite développer son commerce et s’offrir de meilleures conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Monicile is 38 years old. Divorced and mother of one child, she manages a food products and cosmetics store, which allows her to raise her child alone.

Monicile is requesting a microloan to increase her stock of merchandise and, so, be able to sell more. She wishes to grow her business and to provide herself better living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her stock of flour.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 23 years old, single and lives in Irbid.

Ahmad represents an ambitious guy. He wants to help his family with the household expenses to provide a decent life for his family. He could not complete his education because of the financial situation of his family, but he did not want to give up in front of these obstacles and to be a consumer.

Ahmad opened his small business selling cell phones in his shop. His neighbors and friends provide him support that increased his self-confidence and that’s why Ahmad applied for a loan to help him to develop and expand his business, increase sales. buy more tools, cell phones and accessories for the cell phones, and increase his income. He wishes to complete his education some day.
